GitHub Issue #1: Add markdown rendering for chat messages

## Description
AI responses often contain markdown (code blocks, lists, headers, etc.) but currently render as plain text.

## Tasks
- [ ] Install `marked` and `@tailwindcss/typography`
- [ ] Update `ChatMessage.vue` to render markdown for assistant messages
- [ ] Add proper styling for code blocks, lists, tables
- [ ] Consider syntax highlighting for code blocks (highlight.js or similar)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Code blocks render with proper formatting
- Lists, headers, bold/italic render correctly
- User messages remain plain text
- Dark mode supported

Close with: fixes #1

GitHub Issue #3: Add model info and descriptions to model selector

## Description
Help users understand which model to choose by showing descriptions, capabilities, and use cases.

## Tasks
- [ ] Enhance model selector dropdown with descriptions
- [ ] Add model capability badges (fast, creative, coding, etc.)
- [ ] Show model size/context length info
- [ ] Consider tooltip or expandable info section
- [ ] Update ModelName enum with richer metadata

## Model info to display
- **Name**: Human-readable name
- **Description**: 1-2 sentence summary
- **Best for**: Use cases (coding, creative writing, analysis)
- **Speed**: Fast/Medium/Slow indicator
- **Context length**: Token limit

## Acceptance Criteria
- Users can make informed model choices
- Info doesn't clutter the UI
- Works on mobile

Close with: fixes #3

completed.spec: GitHub Issue #21: Add Agent Builder following IndyDevDan's standards
completed.output:
Implemented Agent Builder with full CRUD UI and chat system integration.

## Implementation Summary:
The Agent Builder feature was already implemented with:
- Agent model with proper Eloquent relationships (user, defaultModel, models)
- Full CRUD controller (AgentController)
- Vue UI pages (Index, Create, Edit, Show)
- Comprehensive test coverage (43 tests for agents)

## New Integration Work:
Added chat system integration to use custom agents:

### Backend Changes:
- app/Models/Chat.php: Added agent_id fillable and agent() relationship
- app/Http/Controllers/ChatController.php: Added agents to index/show views, support for agent_id in store
- app/Http/Requests/StoreChatRequest.php: Added agent_id validation (nullable, exists)
- app/Http/Requests/UpdateChatRequest.php: Added agent_id validation (sometimes, nullable)

### Frontend Changes:
- resources/js/types/chat.ts: Added agent_id and agent to Chat interface
- resources/js/pages/Chat/Index.vue: Added agent selector dropdown when creating new chat
- resources/js/pages/Chat/Show.vue: Added agent selector in header, agent indicator badge

## Tests:
- All 362 tests pass (844 assertions)
- Existing Agent tests (43) + Chat tests (95) all passing
